ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Glycerin, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Propylheptyl Caprylate, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Sodium Hyaluronate, Bisabolol, Panthenol, Propylene Glycol, BHT, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Glyceryl Stearate, Xanthan Gum, Cetyl Alcohol, Parfum, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.
